metadata.description: Fire safety and evacuation procedures for second class

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: 你好! 我是小美。让我们练习火灾安全和其他紧急情况。

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: If there's a fire alarm, you can say: 'We need to evacuate now!' or 'Follow the teacher to

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: 很好! That was responsible! Let's also practice helping others.

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: You can say: 'Stay calm, everyone!' or 'Hold hands and walk slowly to the exit'
